Description: * {{PageRef|Rejuvenator|alt_name=Rejuv}} only heals the person hitting the crystal
* Dying to a non-player (when there is no bounty/assists) now increases the respawn time for that death by 10 seconds
* {{PageRef|Patron}} 1st death time is now a constant 12s instead of being variable between 8 and 15 seconds
* {{PageRef|Abrams}}: {{PageRef|Infernal Resilience}} damage regenerated increased from 12% to 13%
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: Weapon Range growth per boon increased from 1.2 to 1.5
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: Bullet damage growth per boon increased from 0.13 to 0.14
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: {{PageRef|Exploding Uppercut}} cooldown reduced from 21s to 19s
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: {{PageRef|Exploding Uppercut}} T1 increased from -10.5s to -11s
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: Hyperbeam cooldown reduced from 120s to 105s
* {{PageRef|Billy}}: Base health from 730 to 740
* {{PageRef|Billy}}: {{PageRef|Rising Ram}} cooldown decreased from 33s to 30s
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: {{PageRef|Gloom Bombs}} T3 increased from +2 Bombs to +3
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: {{PageRef|Leaping Slash}} {{PageRef|Melee|alt_name=melee}} damage scaling increased from 1.3 to 1.5
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: {{PageRef|Leaping Slash}} heal spirit scaling increased from 1.2 to 1.4
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: {{PageRef|Ava}} T3 increased from -15s Cooldown to -20s
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: {{PageRef|Ava}} T3 increased from +25 Health Regen to +35
* {{PageRef|Calico}}: {{PageRef|Return to Shadows}} cooldown reduced from 110s to 100s
* Doorman: {{PageRef|Call Bell}} explosion damage reduced from 70 to 60
* Doorman: {{PageRef|Call Bell}} explosion damage spirit scaling increased from 1.4 to 1.5
* Doorman: {{PageRef|Hotel Guest}} now teleports the target back to the beginning of the hotel if they fall into the void.
* {{PageRef|Drifter}}: Health gain per boon reduced from 41 to 39
* {{PageRef|Drifter}}: Weapon falloff start distance reduced from 24m to 22m
* {{PageRef|Drifter}}: Weapon damage gain per boon reduced from 0.55 to 0.52
* {{PageRef|Drifter}}: {{PageRef|Bloodscent}} T3 Bonus amp damage reduced from +11% to +10%
* {{PageRef|Drifter}}: {{PageRef|Rend}} now causes you to briefly float in the air during the cast time
* {{PageRef|Grey Talon}}: Bullet damage growth based on Spirit Power increased from 0.07 to 0.08
* {{PageRef|Grey Talon}}: {{PageRef|Spirit Snare}} {{PageRef|Curse}} duration increased from 2s to 2.25s
* {{PageRef|Grey Talon}}: {{PageRef|Spirit Snare}} T2 changed from "+0.75 {{PageRef|Curse}} Duration" to "Applies -15% Bullet Resistance for 10s"

* {{PageRef|Grey Talon}}: {{PageRef|Spirit Snare}} T3 changed from "{{PageRef|Grey Talon}} deals +30% more Bullet Damage to enemies hit by {{PageRef|Spirit Snare}} for 10s" to "+1s {{PageRef|Curse}} Duration and +1.5m Radius"
* {{PageRef|Holliday}}: Base bullet damage reduced from 26 to 22
* {{PageRef|Holliday}}: Bullet damage growth increased from 1.08 to 1.23
* {{PageRef|Holliday}}: {{PageRef|Powder Keg}} displacement duration reduced from 1s to 0.4s
* {{PageRef|Holliday}}: {{PageRef|Powder Keg}} damage reduced from 90 to 80
* {{PageRef|Holliday}}: {{PageRef|Powder Keg}} T2 damage reduced from 75 to 65
* {{PageRef|Holliday}}: {{PageRef|Powder Keg}} spirit scaling increased from 1.4 to 1.6
* {{PageRef|Holliday}}: {{PageRef|Powder Keg}} T3 charges reduced from +3 to +2
* {{PageRef|Holliday}}: {{PageRef|Powder Keg}} T3 now also increases displacement duration by 0.4s
* {{PageRef|Infernus}}: {{PageRef|Flame Dash}} DPS reduced from 33 to 30
* {{PageRef|Infernus}}: {{PageRef|Flame Dash}} T2 reduced from +37 DPS to +35
* {{PageRef|Kelvin}}: {{PageRef|Frost Grenade}} cooldown reduced from 22s to 20s
* {{PageRef|Mina}}: {{PageRef|Rake}} heal spirit scaling increased from 1 to 1.5
* {{PageRef|Mina}}: {{PageRef|Love Bites}} buildup now takes 1 less shot
* {{PageRef|Mina}}: {{PageRef|Love Bites}} on proc damage increased from 45 to 55
* {{PageRef|Mina}}: {{PageRef|Love Bites}} on proc damage spirit scaling increased from 1.5 to 1.7
* {{PageRef|Mina}}: {{PageRef|Nox Nostra}} cooldown reduced from 130s to 115s
* {{PageRef|Mirage}}: {{PageRef|Fire Scarabs}} T3 increased from +60 Max Health Steal to +70
* {{PageRef|Mo & Krill}}: {{PageRef|Combo}} cast range reduced from 5m to 4.75m
* {{PageRef|Paige}}: {{PageRef|Defend and Fight!}} barrier spirit power scaling increased from 1.4 to 1.6
* {{PageRef|Paradox}}: Bullet damage growth reduced from 0.275 to 0.27
* {{PageRef|Seven}}: Move speed reduced from 6.9 to 6.8
* {{PageRef|Seven}}: Incoming crit resistance reduced from -35% to -25%
* {{PageRef|Seven}}: {{PageRef|Power Surge}} T3 spirit power scaling reduced from 0.34 to 0.3
* {{PageRef|Seven}}: {{PageRef|Storm Cloud}} DPS spirit scaling reduced from 0.65 to 0.6
* {{PageRef|Seven}}: {{PageRef|Storm Cloud}} initial radius reduced from 12m to 10m
* {{PageRef|Shiv}}: {{PageRef|Serrated Knives}} T3 increased from +37 Damage and +6.5 Bleed DPS to +40 Damage and +7 Bleed DPS
* {{PageRef|Shiv}}: {{PageRef|Slice and Dice}} T3 Max cd reduction from -6s to -8s
* {{PageRef|Shiv}}: {{PageRef|Bloodletting}} cooldown reduced from 25s to 20s
* {{PageRef|Shiv}}: {{PageRef|Bloodletting}} incoming damage deferred increased from 25% to 30%
* {{PageRef|Shiv}}: {{PageRef|Bloodletting}} T3 increased from +35% Damage Cleared to +45%
* {{PageRef|Sinclair}}: {{PageRef|Vexing Bolt}} radius reduced from 3.5 to 3.25
* {{PageRef|Sinclair}}: {{PageRef|Spectral Assistant}} base damage reduced from 18 to 15
* {{PageRef|Sinclair}}: {{PageRef|Spectral Assistant}} spirit scaling increased from 0.28 to 0.36
* {{PageRef|Sinclair}}: {{PageRef|Spectral Assistant}} T3 increased from +45% Fire Rate to +60%
* {{PageRef|Sinclair}}: {{PageRef|Rabbit Hex}} T3 increased from +5% Damage Amp to +7%
* {{PageRef|Sinclair}}: {{PageRef|Audience Participation}} cooldown reduced from 100s to 85s
* {{PageRef|Sinclair}}: {{PageRef|Audience Participation}} duration increased from 10s to 12s
* {{PageRef|Victor}}: Health per boon reduced from 45 to 41
* {{PageRef|Victor}}: {{PageRef|Jumpstart}} recharge timer increased from 3s to 8s
* {{PageRef|Victor}}: {{PageRef|Aura of Suffering}} reduced from 9m to 8m
* {{PageRef|Victor}}: {{PageRef|Aura of Suffering}} cooldown increased from 1s to 2.5s
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: {{PageRef|Stake}} no longer has a smaller tether range than capture range (6m to 9m, no longer pulls you)
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: {{PageRef|Stake}} duration reduced from 2s to 1.75s
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: {{PageRef|Stake}} slow increased from 30% to 40%
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: {{PageRef|Flight}} duration increased from 12s to 13s
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: {{PageRef|Flight}} spirit damage increased from 9 to 10
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: {{PageRef|Flight}} T2 increased from +6s to +7s
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: {{PageRef|Flight}} T3 increased from +11 Spirit Damage to +14

* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: {{PageRef|Crow Familiar}} bleed per second increased from 2.15% to 2.7%
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: {{PageRef|Crow Familiar}} T2 reduced from -16s Cooldown to -12s
* {{PageRef|Viscous}}: Alt Fire base damage reduced from 63 to 48
* {{PageRef|Viscous}}: Alt Fire damage growth increased from 0.45 to 1.25
* {{PageRef|Vyper}}: Falloff min range increased from 13m to 15m
* {{PageRef|Vyper}}: {{PageRef|Screwjab Dagger}} spirit scaling increased from 0.74 to 1.0
* {{PageRef|Vyper}}: Screwjab dagger cooldown reduced from 10s to 9s
* {{PageRef|Vyper}}: {{PageRef|Screwjab Dagger}} T3 increased from +1s Slow Duration to +2s
* {{PageRef|Vyper}}: {{PageRef|Lethal Venom}} cooldown reduced from 26s to 20s
* {{PageRef|Vyper}}: {{PageRef|Petrifying Bola}} range increased from 6m to 8m
* {{PageRef|Vyper}}: {{PageRef|Petrifying Bola}} cooldown reduced from 110s to 90s
* {{PageRef|Warden}}: Base Sprint speed reduced from 2.5 to 2
* {{PageRef|Warden}}: {{PageRef|Alchemical Flask}} T2 reduced from +45 to +40
* {{PageRef|Warden}}: {{PageRef|Last Stand}} spirit scaling reduced from 1.6 to 1.45
* {{PageRef|Weakening Headshot}}: Bullet resistance reduction increased from -12% to -13%
* {{PageRef|Weakening Headshot}}: Debuff duration increased from 10s to 12s
* {{PageRef|Backstabber}}: Cooldown increased from 4s to 5s
* {{PageRef|Backstabber}}: Damage per second reduced from 20 to 17
* {{PageRef|Long Range}}: Now grants +4% Fall Off Range
* {{PageRef|Sharpshooter}}: Sprint increased from 1 to 1.5
* {{PageRef|Blood Tribute}}: Spirit Resistance increased from 8% to 10%
* {{PageRef|Blood Tribute}}: Active move speed increased from 2 to 2.25
* {{PageRef|Headhunter}}: Bonus Damage boon scaling increased from 3 to 4
* {{PageRef|Shadow Weave}}: Invis Sprint speed increased from +2 to +5
* {{PageRef|Capacitor}}: Now grants +8% Fire Rate
* {{PageRef|Capacitor}}: Projectile speed increased by 20%
* {{PageRef|Crippling Headshot}}: Debuff duration increased from 8s to 12s
* {{PageRef|Ricochet}}: No longer targets {{PageRef|Zipline|alt_name=zipline}} targets
* {{PageRef|Spellslinger}}: Buff duration increased from 14 to 18
* {{PageRef|Rebuttal}}: No longer grants +50% {{PageRef|Melee}} Damage on successful {{PageRef|Parry|alt_name=parry}}
* {{PageRef|Rebuttal}}: Now grants +30% Bonus Damage on successful {{PageRef|Parry|alt_name=parry}} (affects all damage, similar to the base {{PageRef|Parry|alt_name=parry}} amplification)
* {{PageRef|Weapon Shielding}}: Damage requirement reduced from 200 to 175
* {{PageRef|Return Fire}}: Bullet Resistance increased from 6% to 8%
* {{PageRef|Restorative Locket}}: No longer scales with Spirit Power (0.17)
* {{PageRef|Restorative Locket}}: Now scales with Boons (0.3)
* {{PageRef|Guardian Ward}}: Cast range increased from 35m to 40m
* {{PageRef|Divine Barrier}}: Cast range increased from 35m to 40m
* {{PageRef|Veil Walker}}: Heal per boon increased from 3 to 4
* {{PageRef|Veil Walker}}: Duration increased from 6s to 7s
* {{PageRef|Healing Nova}}: Heal per boon increased from 4.4 to 6
* {{PageRef|Healing Nova}}: Now grants +6% Ability Range
* {{PageRef|Metal Skin}}: Duration increased from 4s to 5s
* {{PageRef|Counterspell}}: Duration reduced from 1 to 0.9
* {{PageRef|Trophy Collector}}: Out of Combat regen increased from 3.5 to 4
* {{PageRef|Trophy Collector}}: {{PageRef|Souls}} Per Minute increased from 23 to 25
* {{PageRef|Cheat Death}}: Cooldown reduced from 100s to 90s
* {{PageRef|Witchmail}}: Spirit Power bonus increased from 10 to 14
* {{PageRef|Siphon Bullets}}: Max HP Steal reduced from 55 to 35
* {{PageRef|Siphon Bullets}}: Max HP Steal now scales per Boon (0.8)
* {{PageRef|Siphon Bullets}}: Duration reduced from 20s to 17s
* {{PageRef|Inhibitor}}: Healing Reduction increased from -30% to -35%
* {{PageRef|Inhibitor}}: Debuff duration increased from 4s to 5s
* {{PageRef|Rusted Barrel}}: Cast range increased from 23m to 28m
* {{PageRef|Rusted Barrel}}: Bullet Resistance reduction increased from -5% to -6%
* {{PageRef|Bullet Resist Shredder}}: No longer grants +20% {{PageRef|Melee}} Resistance
* {{PageRef|Bullet Resist Shredder}}: Now grants +7% Bullet Resistance
* {{PageRef|Cold Front}}: Damage reduced from 125 to 100
* {{PageRef|Quicksilver Reload}}: Bonus damage reduced from 60 to 55
* {{PageRef|Spirit Sap}}: Spirit Power Reduction increased from -18 to -24
* {{PageRef|Silence Wave}}: Spirit Power Reduction increased from -18 to -24
* {{PageRef|Silence Wave}}: Silence duration reduced from 3.75 to 3.25
* {{PageRef|Silence Wave}}: Width increased by 10%
* {{PageRef|Torment Pulse}}: Cooldown reduced from 1.5 to 1.4
* {{PageRef|Decay}}: Cooldown reduced from 36 to 32
* {{PageRef|Decay}}: Bleed Damage spirit scaling increased from 0.0038 to 0.0055
* {{PageRef|Magic Carpet}}: Spirit Power increased from +10 to +14
* {{PageRef|Magic Carpet}}: Speed increased from 6 to 7
* {{PageRef|Focus Lens}}: Now deals damage whenever the debuff is removed rather than only on expire
* {{PageRef|Escalating Exposure}}: Spirit Resistance reduced from 20% to 17%
* {{PageRef|Spirit Burn}}: Ability Range reduced from 10% to 8%
* {{PageRef|Spirit Burn}}: Proc damage reduced from 120 to 110
